I finally finished doing all the modifications to my scenarios.  The 
file location is 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/Scenarios/scenarios.zip
.  Everybody should be happy with the way I redid "The Brag" because I 
have widened passages to make it easier to walk around and reinforced 
the exterior walls to add more protection against explosions 
(protecting against explosions is another topic, though).  Frankly, I 
don't see a reason to touch up any more of scenarios for now.

I am going to start working on compiling answers for the Scenario 
Trivia Contest.

I am NOT posting the code for how I moved, deleted, and added objects 
unless there is some demand for it because frankly, I've shown how to 
do everything before.  The only difference is I have integrated 
everything.
